name: Necromasser
description:
Recommended: Play instantly, online! http://www.necromasser.com/

Compete against other players to raise the largest zombie horde in this always-on, drop-in/drop-out multiplayer game. Try to get to the top of the leaderboard by controlling the most massive horde, and see how long you can stay there.

Controls:

  • WASD: Move
  • Left-Click: Raise Dead
  • Right-Click: Command Horde

http://www.necromasser.com/
